title: Band, 20th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metal, gilded paper, plastic beads
Technique: plain weave with chain stitch embroidery; stem stitches for beads; couching stitches for black silk; wrapping stitch for gilded paper
description: Beaded band with a narrow border of green and white beads with black and gold trim. Rows of beads in pink, red, green and purple individually framed by gold thread.

tombstone.epitaph:
Band, 20th century.Medium: silk, metal, gilded paper, plastic beads
Technique: plain weave with chain stitch embroidery; stem stitches for beads; couching stitches for black silk; wrapping stitch for gilded paper. 1969-16-5.
